Html:
Hi,

as far as I understand, by default the control doesn't use collection item size from dzc file. It just sets width and height for an item proportionally to control size and items count. But I have a mixed collection with both landscape and portrait image orientation. So is there any way to change this behavior?

Thanks,

Juliana

Hi Juliana,

At the moment Deep Zoom support is limited, but I'm currently working on completing it which would include being able to display tiles of various proportions.

Going forward this functionality will be available under a commercially licensed version of the HTML5 PivotViewer from LobsterPot. Please contact enquiries@lobsterpot.com.au for more details.

Thanks

Roger
